AssetContractRelationship.name: AssetContractRelationship
AssetContractRelationship.description: Represents a relationship between an asset and a contract.

AssetId.description: The ID of the asset related to the contract.

ContractId.description: The ID of the contract related to the asset.

EndDate.description: The end date and time of the relationship between contract and asset.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view. The associated UI label is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but didnâ€™t view it.

Name.description: The auto-generated number assigned to AssetContractRelationship. (Read Only)

StartDate.description: The start date and time of the relationship between contract and asset.

AssetContractRelationship.accessRules: This object is available in Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions of Revenue Cloud.
